OTHER_INSTALLS.description: If you need install packages for running your app(Python is pre-installed).[Space in between each package]
OTHER_INSTALLS.value: apt -qq update && apt -qq install -y git wget pv jq python3-dev ffmpeg mediainfo, apt install ffmpeg

REPO_URL.description: URL of the REPO that you want to deploy.

PYTHON_FILE.description: Name of the python file that you need to run. [use -m if you need to run __main__.py from a folder]

OTHER_CMD.description: If you need to run any bash command other than python specify here
